content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
Discovered this new Korean spot which is so gooood!! Come with me.Highlights of the menu:1. Braised Wagyu beef back ribs2. Spicy marinated fresh raw crabs3. Korean BBQ lateral cut Angus beef short rib4. Kimchi stew5. White rice with beans
